game.name: Macaron Sickness
game.shortDescription: Welcome to a dreamlike world where gothic elegance meets sweet delights. This macaron tower balance game is made for lovers of all things gothic. When you're feeling down or need a little sweetness, build your own fragile and beautiful macaron tower—just for you.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Welcome to a dreamlike world where gothic elegance meets sweet delights. This macaron tower balance game is made for lovers of all things gothic. When you're feeling down or need a little sweetness, build your own fragile and beautiful macaron tower—just for you.
